name: Park Ohio Holdings Corp.
description: Park Ohio Holdings Corp. is a diversified international company that operates through two main segments: Supply Chain Management and Manufacturing. Founded in 1961 and headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, Park Ohio provides a wide range of products and services that include logistics, engineering, and manufacturing solutions. The company has established itself as a leader in the supply chain management sector, delivering customized solutions that optimize efficiency and reduce costs for its clients. Its manufacturing capabilities cover a variety of sectors, including automotive, aerospace, and industrial markets. Park Ohio is committed to innovation, continuously investing in advanced technologies and processes to enhance its operational capabilities. The company’s extensive network of facilities and partnerships enables it to offer comprehensive solutions tailored to the specific needs of its customers. Park Ohio is also dedicated to sustainability, actively seeking ways to minimize its environmental impact and promote responsible practices throughout its operations. With a strong emphasis on customer service and quality, Park Ohio strives to exceed client expectations while fostering long-term relationships based on trust and reliability.
ceo: Edward D. B. J. D. Chisholm

key_executives.name: Edward D. B. J. D. Chisholm
David S. H. D. C. Chisholm

seo.meta_title: Park Ohio Holdings Corp. | Manufacturing and Supply Chain Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Park Ohio Holdings Corp., a leader in manufacturing and supply chain management. Discover our innovative solutions and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What does Park Ohio do?
faq.answer: Park Ohio provides supply chain management and manufacturing solutions across various industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Park Ohio?
faq.answer: Edward D. B. J. D. Chisholm is the CEO of Park Ohio Holdings Corp.

faq.question: Where is Park Ohio headquartered?
faq.answer: Park Ohio is headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What are Park Ohio's main products?
faq.answer: Park Ohio's main products include logistics services, metal fabrication, and custom packaging.
